definition: World Expo/abbr. to 世博[Shi4 bo2]

sentences.english: Mountain flowers in the previous award and award-winning West Lake Expo a few ranking highest in the province.
sentences.chinese: 在历次山花奖和西湖博览会上获奖数均居全省前茅。

sentences.english: The balance shall be paid 45 days before the opening of the trade fair.
sentences.chinese: 剩余展位费在博览会开幕前45天内付清。

sentences.english: Black vitreous enamel plant production, has received medals of Panama International Fair.
sentences.chinese: 该厂产的黑釉瓷，曾获得巴拿马国际博览会奖章。

sentences.english: Next Kortrijk will see without any doubt even bigger results.
sentences.chinese: 下届世界客车博览无疑将有更大的规模。

sentences.english: My company asked me to do a dog-and-pony show about the new product in the exhibition next month.
sentences.chinese: 公司让我下个月在博览会上做一个新产品的展示。

sentences.english: Every March the Armory Show sets up shop in New York.
sentences.chinese: 每年三月，军械博览会都会在纽约设置展场。

sentences.english: In the West world's fairs have long since lost their allure.
sentences.chinese: 西方的世界博览会失去其吸引力是久已有之的事情。

sentences.english: Chinese Vice Premier Zeng Peiyan announced the opening of the five-day fair.
sentences.chinese: 中国副总理曾培炎宣布了此次为期五天的博览会开幕。

sentences.english: The Expo will be held on the first of May and end on the thirtieth of October.
sentences.chinese: 博览会将进行在蒲月一日和十月在三十个完毕。

sentences.english: The entry forms from the gallery of Sonoma County, and will include the mobilization.
sentences.chinese: 参赛表格提供的索诺玛县博览会，将包括详细填写。

sentences.english: Is there anything you find changed about the Fair?
sentences.chinese: 您发现博览会有什么变化吗？

sentences.english: V. China Piano Exposition; Show of World-Famous Pianos ; other cultural activities.
sentences.chinese: 中国钢琴博览会及世界名琴展示会等文化活动。

sentences.english: I hope you join us at the Shanghai Expo.
sentences.chinese: 我希望大家都能光临上海世界博览会。

sentences.english: The Fair in Leipzig and fine porcelain in Meissen are well known around the world.
sentences.chinese: 莱比锡的博览会和迈森的精美瓷器更是享誉世界。

sentences.english: Knight Frank is prv oud tom present our first international property exhibition in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 莱坊国际十分荣幸的向大家推出首届房地产博览会。

sentences.english: Jingyan peach honored with a gold medal in International Gardening Show.
sentences.chinese: 在世界园艺博览会上获金奖。

definition: conversant with things past and present/erudite and informed

the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
many schools of thought/many people or households
collecting together (of distinguished people or exquisite objects)/to gather/to assemble
to view/to look at/to look sth over
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
